TestService.postBody: <wfs:GetFeature service="WFS" version="1.1.0" xmlns:wfs="http://www.opengis.net/wfs" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml" xmlns:er="urn:cgi:xmlns:GGIC:EarthResource:1.1" xmlns:gsml="urn:cgi:xmlns:CGI:GeoSciML:2.0" maxFeatures="20"> <wfs:Query typeName="er:Commodity" srsName="EPSG:4326"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:PropertyIsLike escapeChar="!" wildCard="*" singleChar="#"> <ogc:PropertyName>er:Commodity/gml:name</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal>*</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsLike> </ogc:Filter> </wfs:Query> </wfs:GetFeature>
